alert.note: Alert for Cody Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 10 at 2:24AM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...Strong Winds... This is a special weather statement from the National Weather Service in Riverton. * WHAT...West winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts between 45 and 55 mph. Localized gusts from 60 to 65 mph around Clark. * Where...Cody Foothills. * WHEN...Noon to 9 PM today. * IMPACTS...Mainly to transportation especially along Highway 120. There will be control issues at times, especially for light weight and high profile vehicles, including campers and tractor trailers. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Keep two hands on the steering wheel in case of sudden, strong wind gusts. In a parking lot, park into the wind to minimize the possibility of your car door hitting another parked vehicle.
